segments.text: The May Day holiday is coming . Have you made any plan ? Are you going to stay here or go out for a traveling ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I haven ’ t decided yet . But I may go out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where have you planned to go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to go to Shanghai , but I also want to visit Hainan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then which will be your first choice ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t know . How about you ? are you staying here or somewhere .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have decided to go to Tasha .
segments.speaker: S1
